span.strong: The Special Board Meeting of April 22, 2020, 7:30pm will be held using remote access capabilities (phone and/or internet). Please CLICK HERE for a memo explaining how to access the meeting and information regarding how the public may participate.
The direct link to the online meeting is: meet.google.com/orn-ysxs-mme

a.title: Go to comments for Current Board Meeting Agenda

p.span: In case of a closure, K-5 students need access to work packets. ATS and MVS will be open from 12-2 for parent pick up. Drive up in bus lane to your respective child's school. Additional times will be posted for Monday, if necessary.

a.title: Go to comments for K-5 Parent Pick Up

p.span: The ATSD will be closed to students, Friday, 3/13, using a snow day, in order to provide staff with additional time to plan home instruction in the event of a health-related school closure.

a.title: Go to comments for PD Day 3/13

span.p: Please see this letter from Mr. Flynn regarding an incident at ATS, 3/10/2020.
